para:
In most cases your workflow with &PROD; applications would be the following:
Use &DCW; and possibly other applications from &PROD; application suite to see what the clustering results are like for your content. If the results are promising, you can use the &DCW; to further tune the clustering algorithm's settings.
If you are developing Java software, use &PROD; API and JAR to integrate clustering into your code. For non-Java environments, set-up the &DCS; and call &PROD; clustering using the REST protocol.
